page.title: 14SEWSTERN INDUSTRIAL ESTATE
page.content: The Sewstern Industrial Estate is situated 5 miles from the A1 Trunk Road. It comprises of 12 Units and in all employs some 50 people. There is a Sawmill covering British Furniture Trade, Welding, Waste Disposal, Transport Company, Road Haulage, manufacturers of wooden products for Audio Industry, Ayto Firm, Radio Communications, two storage units and two vacant ones. This is a busy site in the day with the whirr of saws, rumble of traffic and the sounds of metal being worked. Owing to the increased traffic flow the road leading to the Estate had to be widened in 1985. The Industrial Estate was formed as a result of the Iron Ore Works closing. The site was the Iron Ore Railway Workshops. Buckminster Trust Estate are the owners of the estate and have
